review_title: Great place to work, Family focused
pros: Very supportive of upward mobility and in house training. Focused on work-life balance for all staff.

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Greenville, FL

cons: Poor leadership at the top. Too much turnover.

review_title: “Great place to work! Environment promotes trust/community”
pros: All the other staff I've encountered are passionate about helping the teens and families we serve. Everyone I have interacted with seems to be working here for the right reasons and truly care about changing lives. The work environment promotes trust and close community among staff. Management acts with professionalism and care towards staff. Clients are treated with respect and compassion across the board. Exciting time right now with lots of growth and positive change happening.
cons: Some residential staff required to raise partial or full-salary support to keep tuition costs down for struggling families.

cons: I don't see any cons right now.  Challenges yes, "cons" no.
